Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - TVC v0.3.0

TV Calendar app for tracking TV shows and scheduling episodes.

Features:
- Search and track TV shows via TVDB API
- Month, Week, and Agenda calendar views
- Schedule episodes manually with multi-select and season scheduling
- Day detail view for managing episodes
- Mark episodes as watched
- Auto-updater support (ready for GitHub Releases)

Tech stack:
- Tauri v2 (Rust backend)
- Svelte 5 + TypeScript (frontend)
- Tailwind CSS v4 (styling)
- SQLite (local storage)
